content: i free-handed this little cute little rag doll bunny as i wanted to gift it to my niece for her birthday i decided to put the pattern to paper as many expressed interest in having it i used multiple colours of bernat premium yarn but other yarns would work as well feel free to get creative with colours in order to use up small bits of yarn left over from other projects to complete this project you will need a 5mm hook a bit of stuffing for the head a stitch marker darning needle and scissors a basic knowledge of the following stitches is required mc chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet increase decrease inv decrease this is my first pattern and i am offering it for free happy crocheting
